answerText: Simon Rosedale [or Simon Rosedale][10] Simon Rosedale proposes marriage to this woman, the protagonist of The House of Mirth. She is ostracized due to a rumor she is having an affair with George Dorset.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 10 | 11 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This characters spots his future love interest coming out of the Benedick in the first chapter of the novel in which he appears. For 10 points each: [10] Name this greedy Jewish investor whose proposal of marriage is refused by a social climber who soon loses her stature and overdoses on chloral.
